abstract: Driven column review of BMW X5 xDrive40e hybrid.

headline.print_headline: The BMW X5 40e, a Hybrid for the Future
headline.main: Video Review: The BMW X5 xDrive40e, a Hybrid for the Future

snippet: The fuel savings may not offset the cost at today’s prices, but this well-engineered and smooth-driving S.U.V requires no other sacrifices of its owner.
lead_paragraph: The fuel savings may not offset the cost at today’s prices, but this well-engineered and smooth-driving S.U.V requires no other sacrifices of its owner.
